law.text: There is hereby established a Kentucky Soybean Promotion Board. The promotion board shall consist of four (4) members appointed by the Kentucky Soybean Association; two (2) members appointed by the Kentucky Farm Bureau Federation; one (1) member appointed by the Commissioner of Agriculture; the Kentucky director or directors who serve on the United Soybean Board; and the Kentucky director or directors who serve on the American Soybean Association. The appointments shall be for terms of two (2) fiscal years, a fiscal year running from July 1 to the following June 30, and each appointing body shall promptly file with the promotion board the names of its respective appointees.
law.history: Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 88, sec. 5, effective July 12, 2006. -- Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 45, sec. 5, effective July 14, 1992.
